sentences.english: The alarm clock rings at seven in the morning.
I get out of bed and go to the bathroom.
I quickly take a hot shower.
Then I go to the kitchen.
There is a newspaper and a coffee cup on the table.
I sit in the kitchen and eat breakfast.
At eight o'clock I leave home for work to the city center.
I sit on a hot bus for 20 minutes.

sentences.finnish: Töissä puhun puhelimessa ja käytän tietokonetta.
sentences.english: At work I talk on the phone and use the computer.

sentences.finnish: Päivällä käyn torilla ja syön vähän.
sentences.english: During the day I visit the market and eat a little.
Then I go back to work to the office.

sentences.finnish: Työpäivä loppuu viideltä ja ajan bussilla kotiin.
sentences.english: The workday ends at five and I drive home by bus.
I am home at half past five.

sentences.finnish: Teen ruokaa, syön ja katson uutiset.
sentences.english: I cook, eat, and watch the news.
Then I go to an English course.

sentences.finnish: Kun kurssi loppuu, käyn vielä nopeasti apteekkissa ja kaupassa.
sentences.english: When the course ends, I quickly visit the pharmacy and the store.
